name: Mockbuster Video
description:
This game was made in 7 days for Brackey's Jam 2020.2 and is my second game jam entry. The theme was rewind, so I decided to make a game wherein you, a loyal employee of Mockbuster Video, must sell VHS tapes and charge extra fees on returns if they forgot to rewind the cassette (among other things).

Made using the Godot game engine.

Main menu theme made using BeepBox.

This game is open source and licensed under the GNU General Public License v2.0. The code can be found on my Github although this is my first time using Godot and the code is an absolute mess of spaghetti.
